name: Anidle
description: Guess the anime from clues like MAL score, studio, genres, release date, source, and tags! You have 21 tries - get hints at try 10 (blurred cover), try 15 (synopsis), and try 20 (popular character). Daily challenges and unlimited mode available!

achievements.title: First Guess
achievements.description: Correctly guess an anime for the first time.

achievements.title: Perfect Score
achievements.description: Guess the anime on your first try with maximum points.

achievements.title: No Hints Needed
achievements.description: Guess correctly before any hints are revealed (before try 10).

achievements.title: Last Chance
achievements.description: Guess correctly on your final (21st) try.
